recommendations: Hansveen Kaur ‚ÄúShubhangi is a self-driven and competitive professional. She makes a smart team member and has good knowledge of client management and brand understanding. She proves her interest and drive in the field by going out of her way to make connections and look for outside-the-box opportunities for our clients. She will be a true asset to any team and has my heartfelt recommendation.‚Äù

Pankila Malhotra ‚ÄúShubhangi has worked in the brand solutions team of Momspresso for around 2 years now. In addition to her excellent core skills of handling big brands seamlessly, she exhibited an understanding about Marketing & Servicing. She is a smart team member or a polished professional to augment your business plan execution. I would recommend Shubhangi very highly, not for her knowledge and skills but also for her ability to remain calm under severe pressure situations.‚Äù
